channel.title: Inv reset
channel.description: my inv resets when i bank or trade, like when i move stuff around then trade someone it goes back to the way it was before i moved it.. any fixes?

item.title: Inv reset
item.dc:creator: @BenMoss BenMoss
item.description:
@BenMoss wrote:

no like i move stuff around like lets say put a whip on the ags spot and then you cant use either of the items but if you drop something or eat they move back to there old spot… and when pking i move my inv around to put pots on the side runes on bottom etc, then eat and they all go back to the top and shit…

Read full topic

item.title: Inv reset
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

I’m pretty sure that’s how It’s supposed to be… If I’m understanding how you described it.
